Text:
!!! Don`t brick your PS3 !!!

         !!! Read the pdf before using it !!!

!!! If you don`t know how to use it, don`t DL this !!!

This torrent contains all you need to install
CFW on your PS3

hey i got this work :) with my slim ps3 gran turismo etc works greate :) but i got one little problem i cant get any ftp programs to my ps3 installed not even that is included in this release :( any help? multiman installed and works greate

You have to start from the beginning again
Install:
1 OFW 3.55 (Sony official firmware)
2 geohot jailbreak
3 Blackbox FTP 1.2 / Multiman
4 Waninkoko CFW 3.55 

Because otherwise you need apps signed for waninkoko`s CFW 3.55

okay i got it work without installing cfw again .. i found blackbox ftp wich is signed for wanikoko's fw 3.55 :) but there is lots of old games (backupped with 3.41 backup manager's) wich wont work but gran turismo and sly trilogy working so far .. waiting for patch or something for "old games"
Thanks for sharing this I need the CFW for repair a brick, thanks for the file, and keep seeding
